portofolio.title: ChampScraper: Python Web Scraper for Champions League Insights
portofolio.description: ChampScraper is a Python web scraper that scrapes data from the official UEFA website and provides insights on the Champions League. The scraper is built using the BeautifulSoup library

portofolio.title: MovieTrackr
portofolio.description: MovieTrackr is a versatile C# application designed to help users organize and manage their movie-watching experience. With MovieTrackr, users can easily catalog the movies they've watched, rate them, add actors, and even support multiple user profiles.

portofolio.title: CurrencyXchange
portofolio.description: CurrencyXchange is a user-friendly Java application that facilitates real-time currency exchange between various denominations. It utilizes the CurrencyAPI, a comprehensive exchange rate provider, to offer accurate and up-to-date conversion rates. It also uses a MongoDB NoSQL database in order to keep track of all your transactions.
